{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|1=
packaged_task&amp; operator=( const packaged_task&amp; ) = delete;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|1=
packaged_task&amp; operator=( packaged_task&amp;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Copy assignment operator is deleted, {{tt|std::packaged_task}} is move-only.
@2@ Releases the shared state, if any, destroys the previously-held task, and moves the shared state and the task owned by {{c|rhs}} into {{c|*this}}. {{c|rhs}} is left without a shared state and with a moved-from task.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|the {{tt|std::packaged_task}} to move from}}
{{par end}}
